dialogueNodes.text: Welcome, to a tale unknown to most.
We start at the Klagenfurt Quantum Game Academy,  an innovative, futuristic institution dedicated to game studies and engineering.
Here young minds are not just prepared for the digital future, but are actively involved in shaping it, pushing the boundaries of the physical and digital realms.
Because in this, virtual reality is more than simply a videogame in a pc.
In this academy, a brilliant student named Haru is currently pursuing his dreams with his exceptional intellect.
With his passion for gaming, a grand journey is outlined for him.
One fateful day, during the exploration of an unknown digital world, Haru received a vision.
Accompanied by an image of a green creature, imprisoned in a magic circle.
The creature was Gamebert, imprisoned by a vicious mage called Johan Huizinga.
Along with his disciples, Felixus, Matthiatos, Reneah, and Marcaton, Huizinga was a tyrant who was holding Gamebert.
“I need to save Gamebert”, Haru thought to himself.
